caption: b'No matter where you are this holiday season, have a seat at our table. Our partners shared their favorite recipes for this holiday season. #GobbleGobble #HappyThanksgiving \n@disney  @spursofficial  @venturiracing  @warriors'

b'The \xe2\x80\x9cdeath of cities\xe2\x80\x9d predictions are premature. In fact, technology is helping cities from London to L.A. adapt to new priorities like sanitation and contact tracing. Tap the link in our bio to hear #smartcity predictions from actual experts \xe2\x80\x94 @bernard.marr, Yanick Pouffary and Lorenzo Gonzales \xe2\x80\x94\xc2\xa0only on the #ElementPodcast:studio_microphone:'

b'An exponential increase in supercomputing power is right around the corner. To hear predictions about what will be possible in the #Exascale era of #HPC from @bernard.marr and other experts, tap the link in our bio and tune in to the #ElementPodcast:studio_microphone:.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re joining team members, customers and partners in celebrating 5 years of advancing the way people live and work. So, who wants the first byte of birthday cake?\xc2\xa0:birthday_cake:'

b'Employees at HPE\xe2\x80\x99s Technology Renewal Centre in Erskine, Scotland say the facility is welcoming and colleagues are always willing to help one another. In some cases, work is a true #family affair \xe2\x80\x93 the center counts many sets of relatives among its employees, including Operations Manager Jackie and his son Jack, Production Manager Ian and his son Tomas, and Peter and his grandson Robert. #WeAreHPE'

b'How does prioritizing innovation and inclusion help our partner @Disney create unforgettable experiences for families from around the world? #HispanicHeritageMonth

\xe2\x80\xa2 \xe2\x80\x9cWe live for the moment that our diverse multi-generational guests can enter an immersive world and each generation can be overtaken by the magic that Walt Disney Imagineering creates,\xe2\x80\x9d says Alfredo Ayala, Executive Research & Development Imagineer, @waltdisneyimagineering.
\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0ESPN Wide World of Sports @waltdisneyworld\xc2\xa0GM Jose Mola\xe2\x80\x99s multicultural upbringing helps him solve problems: \xe2\x80\x9cThis openness to other vantage points has been a great benefit for me as a leader.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'This hurricane season, it feels especially important\xc2\xa0to be pup-pared. :dog_face: That\xe2\x80\x99s why HPE\xc2\xa0employees working from home in hurricane-prone\xc2\xa0areas like Puerto Rico are happy to have our\xc2\xa0emergency kits with the essentials. This one\xc2\xa0found its way to Brownie, HPE Procurement Operation Analyst\xc2\xa0Abimael Lopez\xe2\x80\x99s Labrador retriever, during\xc2\xa0Hurricane Laura.\n\xc2\xa0\nThe HPE Aguadilla team is safe \xe2\x80\x93 Brownie included \xe2\x80\x93\xc2\xa0and we\xe2\x80\x99re inspired by their\xc2\xa0pawsitivity. :paw_prints: :winking_face: \xc2\xa0#WeAreHPE'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI come from a Portuguese and Brazilian background, and there is nothing I'm more proud of. I love our culture, and I especially admire the ability that our people have of being grateful \xe2\x80\x94 even through tough times."

Sergio Sette C\xc3\xa2mara, Test & Reserve Driver with our partner @redbullracing, hopes to give back to his home country by supporting Brazilian motorsports throughout his career. He's proud to be an ambassador with @institutoayrtonsenna, serving\xc2\xa0as a role model to younger generations. :Portugal::Brazil:

#HispanicHeritageMonth'

b'"There have been very tough moments in my career where I felt like quitting, but I'm proud of how far I've come."
\xc2\xa0
Lucia Leon, a defender for Tottenham Hotspur Women's Football Club, is motivated by her trailblazing role as one of the league\xe2\x80\x99s few Hispanic players. Despite being away from her home in Spain, Lucia has persevered and is proud of where her personal journey has led.
\xc2\xa0
#HispanicHeritageMonth #THWFC @spurswomen'

b'This month, we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating #HispanicHeritageMonth with our partners and team members around the world! Get ready to hear stories from Latinx and Hispanic trailblazers from HPE, the sports world & beyond. Stay tuned! #WeAreHPE'

b'They say that your first job out of college is never your dream job. But this couldn\xe2\x80\x99t be further from the truth for Emily Bynum, HPE intern-turned-Digital Marketing Strategist for Hybrid IT. Her advice for young women in STEM? \xe2\x80\x9cYou are never too young or too inexperienced to conquer the task in front of you. With a smile on your face and the willingness to learn, there is nothing that you can\xe2\x80\x99t accomplish.\xe2\x80\x9d #HumanElement #WeAreHPE #WomeninTech #WomeninSTEM'

b'"We want to build a community of technological innovators who are truly connected to their communities." - HPE CEO Antonio Neri reflects on employees\' commitment to being a force for good. :clapping_hands: From our recent volunteering milestone to today\'s kickoff of the 2020 HPE Accelerating Impact campaign, where employees each receive a $25 credit from the HPE Foundation to gift to one of 40 participating tech nonprofits, our work is just getting started.'

b'When learning moved online, students without computers lost their access to education. Thanks to @bhghnetwork and a sustainably refurbished technology donation from HPE,\xc2\xa0students in need are back to\xc2\xa0learning from home. #WeAreHPE'

b'From starting as an assembly line worker to joining the Engineering Operations Support team, Luz Acosta is well-versed around the tech field. During her time on the assembly line, she recommended a more efficient method for packaging \xe2\x80\x93 which helped her get noticed for future opportunities. Her advice for other women interested in the industry is to \xe2\x80\x9cbe open, find new ideas and do things differently.\xe2\x80\x9d #WomenInTech #WeAreHPE'

b'In @fiaformulae racing, the track is a testing ground for the technology that will power the next generation of sustainable transportation. \xe2\x80\x9cThe goal is to demonstrate the feasibility of using zero-emission vehicles even under the most extreme conditions,\xe2\x80\x9d explains @susie_wolff, Team Principal of @venturi_fe. As her team\xe2\x80\x99s Official Technology Partner, we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to accelerate the innovation that will bring greener cars to the road.'

b'Three years ago, HPE CEO Antonio Neri predicted the enterprise of the future would be edge-centric, cloud-enabled and data-driven. Today, the future is here. Welcome to the Age of Insight \xe2\x80\x94 where everything is connected by a single force, hybrid cloud is the norm and data fuels innovation in real time.:light_bulb:'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cThings change overnight, so you have to stay on your toes.\xe2\x80\x9d Angel Santiago audits technology and trains technicians at our Technology Renewal Center in Andover, Massachusetts. As he assesses incoming systems, Angel sees changing product requirements firsthand as more organizations move to cloud-based solutions. #WeAreHPE'

b'From introducing HPE Ezmeral to celebrating the women changing tech with @soledadobrien, #HPEDiscover Virtual Experience had it all. While our live programming has come to an end, you can still watch over 150 sessions on demand through HPE Discover More Network: hpe.com/dmn'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI don\xe2\x80\x99t think any company is entitled to a future. It\xe2\x80\x99s about who disrupts \xe2\x80\x94 and who has the courage to change and get outside their comfort zone.\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0:speech_balloon:\xc2\xa0Watch as tech industry legend\xc2\xa0John Chambers\xc2\xa0shares\xc2\xa0predictions with HPE CEO Antonio Neri\xc2\xa0on\xc2\xa0how #AI and edge-to-cloud technologies\xc2\xa0are going to change everything. #HPEDiscover'

b'Breathe in, breathe out, destress \xe2\x80\x93 today is your day, sysadmins. We appreciate your hard work and willingness to face challenges head on so that we can have peace in our workdays. #SysAdminDay'
b'To our customers, partners and HPE team members \xe2\x80\x93 thank you for coming together to solve problems and supporting local communities in response to COVID-19.'

b'You can\xe2\x80\x99t fit an entire day of #tech solutions, sports icons and virtual sing-alongs into one video \xe2\x80\x93 but we think this comes close. What was your favorite moment from #HPEDiscover Virtual Experience?\xc2\xa0:speech_balloon:'
b':sparkles: BEHOLD :sparkles:\xc2\xa0HPE Ezmeral. Our new #software brand is a real gem. :gem_stone: Tune in to discover.hpe.com on July 29 to learn more.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cAs a kid, I would be taking VCRs apart, taking phones apart. It was always near me, but I didn\xe2\x80\x99t realize that it would be my whole career.\xe2\x80\x9d AJ Farmer, an Account Support Manager for Mid Enterprise, has been interested in technology since he was young. #WeAreHPE #HumanElement #LifeInsideTheElement'

b'Good news: #HPEDiscover Virtual Experience kicked off with announcements, celebrity guests and tech insights. Better news: You can keep the :party_popper: going with on-demand highlights. Check out some of our favorite moments.'

b'This year, while we recognize PRIDE month, HPE LGBTQ+ team members stand in solidarity with our Black and African American team members because none of us are equal until all of us are equal. Our history is marked with countless Black LGBTQ+ trailblazers who paved the way, including Baynard Rustin and Marsha P. Johnson. That is why, this year, we focus on the intersectionality of PRIDE and engaging allies to be unconditionally inclusive in partnership with our HPE Black Employee Network and @OutandEqual. #WeAreHPE'

b'Be our guest. HPE employees all over the world, along with DCappella, Disney\xe2\x80\x99s a cappella singing sensation, invite you to join us at #HPEDiscover Virtual Experience - no matter where you are. #WeAreHPE'

b'From HPE leaders to technology and industry experts\xc2\xa0and the sport\xe2\x80\x99s elite \xe2\x80\x93 you won\xe2\x80\x99t want to miss the event of the year! Join us at #HPEDiscover Virtual Experience to hear about tech innovations, live and on-demand sessions and demos, and more. See you there!'

b'Whether you\xe2\x80\x99re biking around the neighborhood, trying out new recipes or enjoying the great outdoors (with proper social distancing, of course) \xe2\x80\x93 we want to hear what you\xe2\x80\x99ve been up to! Share your favorite #StayAtHome activities in the comments below. #WeAreHPE #HPEYEN :camera_with_flash:: HPE YEN Belgium Team'

b'Setting a strong example for aspiring #WomenInTech, Jordan is the youngest employee at our Technology Renewal Center in Erskine, Scotland. She is on a team responsible for testing drives (often multiple times!) to ensure they are functional and clear of all data before they are reconfigured for a new customer. #IWD2020\xc2\xa0#InternationalWomensDay #EachForEqual'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cYou need to push yourself out of your comfort zone and sometimes that means you have to jump into the unknown to grow.\xe2\x80\x9d
As a driver in a male-dominated industry, there weren\xe2\x80\x99t a lot of female racers Susie Wolff could look up to for mentorship. Now as Team Principal of ROKiT Venturi Racing she leads by example for the next generation of drivers.

#IWD2020 #InternationalWomensDay #WomenLeaders #EachForEqual @venturi_fe'

b'The moment WE\xe2\x80\x99VE been waiting for\xe2\x80\xa6 #HPEDiscover early bird registration is underway! Join us in Las Vegas June 23-25 to explore breakthrough #tech innovations, network with experts in the field and more. It\xe2\x80\x99s going to be :banana::banana::banana:. #VegasBound'

b'Kaye Slay has been #slaying the tech world since she was in elementary school. \xe2\x80\x9cI remember taking my first computer class when I was 9, and when I was 11, I built a computer with my mom. By the time I reached junior high, I tested out of computer class and was the computer lab assistant. My mom and aunt both had successful careers in tech, which inspired me to pursue the same.\xe2\x80\x9d She is now a Global Learning Systems Analyst in our Houston office. \xe2\x80\x9cWith HPE, I feel empowered to reach my full potential.\xe2\x80\x9d #HumanElement #WeAreHPE #WomeninTech #WomeninSTEM'

b'What better way to celebrate the #LunarNewYear than with a dance performance, fashion show and feast with your favorite HPE family! Wishing you all a prosperous new year full of happiness and health. Share your favorite Lunar New Year traditions with us in the comments below. #WeAreHPE #TBT'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cIf my team was a food, it would be meatloaf. Comprised of many elements and ingredients, all significant \xe2\x80\x93 mixed together for the purpose of remaining solid when pressure is applied.\xe2\x80\x9d Andre Johnson, HPE Primera Storage Engineer and his team bring a diverse mix of skills and experience to the table. #WeAreHPE #LifeInsideTheElement #LifeAtHPE'

b"Kevin Freymeyer is taking OEM Solutions to new heights \xe2\x80\x93 literally.\n\nInspired by the beauty and magnitude of mountains, Kevin embarked on an 80+ mile journey to #MountEverest Base Camp. Spanning 13 days and heights of up to 18,500 feet, the HPE Sales Manager came back with a refreshed perspective on how to be a better leader. His advice: \xe2\x80\x9cDo something that pushes you out of your comfort zone. When you challenge yourself to something more difficult; you'll be surprised how far perseverance takes you.\xe2\x80\x9d #WeAreHPE #Mountaineering #EverestBaseCamp"

b'Hannah Duong, a member of our Channel Operations team in Melbourne, practices Mixed Martial Arts in her free time. \xe2\x80\x9cIt takes a lot of time, patience, and determination to see results, which inspires me when I get to work.\xe2\x80\x9d #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #LifeInsideTheElement #LifeAtHPE'
b':police_car_light::police_car_light:Guess that Server!:police_car_light::police_car_light: Can you guess what server model is shown in this clip? #Trivia #Tech #ITSM #HPE'

b'Wilson Perez is passionate about the work he does at the Aruba Network Test Lab in Costa Rica. \xe2\x80\x9cA world where everything computes is a world full of opportunities. Everything is more efficient or better understood thanks to computers. And I\xe2\x80\x99m not talking about robots or fancy tech, but AI that can collect data and provide solutions on how to make our planet a better place.\xe2\x80\x9d #WeAreHPE #HumanElement #LifeInsideTheElement'

b'Straight from Hewlett Packard Labs :right_arrow_selector: We\xe2\x80\x99re developing accelerators to perform core AI algorithms with extreme speed and energy efficiency. Take a closer look. :eyes: :eyes: #WeAreHPE #HewlettPackardLabs'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m a business person and strategist, but have always gravitated towards the creative side.\xe2\x80\x9d Throughout her career, Chief Brand Officer Marissa Freeman has expressed confidence in trying new things. Now she\xe2\x80\x99s sharing that background\xe2\x80\x94and an insider look at the trends impacting her day-to-day work\xe2\x80\x94in our very first interview. Follow the link in bio to read more. #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #HumanElement #LifeAtHPE'

b'Every year, Singaporean President Halimah Yacob hosts the President\xe2\x80\x99s Challenge to encourage people from all walks of life to help those who are less fortunate. Our HPE Singapore team was selected to help community members and young children at @FaithActsSG. Between a fundraising carnival, the Istana Open House, a Universal Studios Singapore Family Day, and birthday celebrations for the children at FaithActs, our teammates demonstrated the true meaning of #HPEGives. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud of our Singapore team for all their hard work and for being this year\xe2\x80\x99s recipients of the prestigious President\xe2\x80\x99s Challenge Award. Congratulations! #WeAreHPE #communityservice #volunteering'

b'Van Hua, who\xe2\x80\x99s been part of our team for 36 years, works in HPE\xe2\x80\x99s Technology Renewal Center testing enterprise configurations for preowned systems that will be sold to new owners. Having immigrated from Vietnam, Van says the patience to learn new things over time has been key to her success. #WeAreHPE #LifeInsideTheElement #HumanElement #LifeAtHPE #WomenInTech'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re not just telling but showing the story of the #CircularEconomy through 360-degree #VirtualReality. Step #behindthescenes of this unique video shoot at our Andover Technology Renewal Center, one of two facilities where 58 million pounds of IT assets each year get new life through #upcycling. (And don\xe2\x80\x99t forget to stay out of view of the camera!)'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cGame-changing. Brilliant. Strong.\xe2\x80\x9d These three words hardly begin to describe the inspiring women who work at HPE. Take Adrian Velez, Director of Digital Marketing Strategy and Operations, who is raising the next generation of strong women. \xe2\x80\x9cAs a mother of two girls, I work every day to show them, through my actions and my career, that they can do anything they put their mind to. I have worked in two male-dominated industries, and I\xe2\x80\x99ve learned that there is no reason to stop pursuing what you are passionate about \xe2\x80\x93 regardless if you are a woman or a mother. You can kick butt at work and still make it to soccer practice on time! It is all about finding your balance.\xe2\x80\x9d #HumanElement #WeAreHPE #WomenInSTEM #WomenInTech'

b'These server components at our Andover Technology Renewal Center have been tested, refurbished and confirmed to be ready for use. Now they can start their next life incorporated into custom enterprise systems. Swipe to see the process from start to finish. #CircularEconomy #Recycling #Sustainability'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cMy spirit animal would be an otter. They are frequently active and most of my day I am not sitting in one place.\xe2\x80\x9d Much like these mobile creatures, Operations Manager Jenni Malz knows how to stay active throughout her workday in Ratingen, Germany. #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #LifeInsideTheElement #LifeAtHPE'

b'#DYK servers can get a second wind as well? Each year, HPE\xe2\x80\x99s technology renewal centers process 4 million servers and other units of equipment at the end of their life cycle. There, they can be placed in our asset #upcycling or #reuse programs. #CircularEconomy #Recycling #Sustainability'

b'"To relax, I like to play sports, volunteer, eat chocolate and sleep.\xe2\x80\x9d Lucie Vachova, an Executive Assistant, knows that a little R&R can help her come to work recharged. What do you do to recharge for the workday? :chocolate_bar: #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #LifeInsideTheElement #LifeAtHPE'

b"The beautiful game is about to get a whole lot tastier. With 1,641 Wi-Fi access points and turn by turn app navigation in Tottenham Hotspur's new stadium, fans can get to bars, restaurants and shops without dropping a connection. Just think of all the possibilities! #PoweredByHPE #COYS #THFC"

b'We make embracing the #CircularEconomy as simple as a wave of a wand. Our #sustainable production cycle uses #recycled materials that push the industry to be more energy efficient, lowering costs and greenhouse gas emissions. #WeAreHPE #Repurpose #Reuse #Sustainability'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cIf my team was a type of food, we would be an avocado because it is a super food, and we are a super team!\xe2\x80\x9d The peak season for avocados may be April \xe2\x80\x93 July, but Emmy Jordan and her Inside Sales team are great all year round. :avocado: #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #LifeInsideTheElement #LifeAtHPE #GHC19'

b'During college, Jennifer Smith\xe2\x80\x99s advisor told her she wouldn\xe2\x80\x99t succeed as an engineer. Fast forward to the present: she\xe2\x80\x99s (working in London) helping deliver innovative business solutions on our Global Financial Services Industry Marketing team. \xe2\x80\x9cOne of the things I love about HPE is the opportunity to work across the globe with incredible humans on impactful technology,\xe2\x80\x9d Oh, and that degree? She graduated magna cum laude in Industrial and Systems Engineering. #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #WomenInSTEM #GHC19'

b'As summer comes to an end, we\xe2\x80\x99d like to take a moment to appreciate our employees and the hard work they put in this year. Whether they participated in our #GlobalDayofService or volunteered during their Wellness Fridays, we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to give back together. From blood drives to #backtoschool prep and beautifying local schools, our employees showed their unwavering commitment to their communities. We can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to see what\xe2\x80\x99s in store for fall. :fallen_leaf::fallen_leaf: #WeAreHPE #HPEGives'

b'This summer, we had the pleasure of hosting Girls Tech Camp in Houston. From hands-on coding and hardware activities to tours of our labs and a panel featuring women leaders, these girls got an insider\xe2\x80\x99s look into the #tech world. Some even have been motivated to take on more tech and computer courses! #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #STEM #GirlsInTech'

b'Take a look at the #esports arena of the future. Packed with new #tech advancements like 5G, high-performance computing and intelligent data \xe2\x80\x93 it creates faster, real-time play for gamers and fans alike. Powerful CPU and GPU capabilities create an immersive experience by giving users smoother and more playable games in full #VR. Link in bio. #PoweredbyHPE #NationalVideoGamesDay #Videogames @wpbrandstudio'

b'Last year, 50 million tons of #ewaste were generated worldwide. To tackle the growing demands of businesses and the need to scale up sustainably, we\xe2\x80\x99ve developed programs to encourage a circular economy, like upcycling aging technology. 91% of the 4 million units returned to our Technology Renewal Centers were #recycled or refurbished. Embrace the #CircularEconomy. #WeAreHPE #Sustainability #Repurpose #Reuse :artist_palette:: @zaydmenk'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m proud to be part of an organization that plays a leading role in the industry. Not just in technology and innovations, but culture and people as well.\xe2\x80\x9d Eunice He, APJ Regional Pricing Lead in Singapore, shares pride in the way her team supports each other and tackles projects as a unit. \n#WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #HumanElement #LifeInsideTheElement #LifeAtHPE'

b'#F1 driver @LewisHamilton is no stranger to the complexities of racing or IT. With race simulations generating up to 50 TB of computational fluid dynamic (CFD) data per week, his experience comes in handy behind the wheel. Prior to his #GrandPrix debut, Lewis worked at his father\xe2\x80\x99s IT company. Swipe :right_arrow_selector: to hear more about his beginnings during his panel at #HPEDiscover 2018. Good luck to Lewis and our partner @mercedesamgf1 as they head into the #BelgianGP! #PoweredByHPE #Formula1'

b'Krishan Kumar, one of our summer software engineer interns, is a pro when it comes to embodying the HPE values. He encourages incoming interns to never stop innovating and network with as many people as possible. #WeAreHPE #LifeAtHPE'

b'Orange you glad you joined HPE? As an intern on the HPE Pointnext team, one of Janelle Acevedo\xe2\x80\x99s (bottom right) favorite projects was organizing a #volunteer event at the @2ndharvest Food Bank with her peers. They sorted 3,600 pounds of food. Talk about tons of fun! :tangerine: #WeAreHPE #LifeAtHPE'

b'As we approach the end of summer, we\xe2\x80\x99d like to take a moment to thank our #interns around the world for the impact they\xe2\x80\x99ve had on us. Whether they joined us fresh out of school or were looking for a career change, each provided a new perspective and a hunger to learn more. We\xe2\x80\x99re humbled that you chose us to help you on your journey. #WeAreHPE #LifeAtHPE'

b'Come on you #Spurs! You don\xe2\x80\x99t want to miss a moment when the @spursofficial take the pitch this season at their new home stadium. Packed with 1,641 Wi-Fi access points, fans can stay connected anywhere in the stadium. #COYS #THFC #PoweredByHPE'

b'In her high school years, Kristen Reyes would drive by our Houston campus on a weekly basis. \xe2\x80\x9cI realized early on that I had the privilege to have a global powerhouse right in my neighborhood \xe2\x80\x93 who wouldn\xe2\x80\x99t want to be a part of that?\xe2\x80\x9d Now, as a Digital Marketing Strategist and nearing her 13th year at HPE, she builds the strategy behind how we drive awareness for our #storage, #security and #server solutions. Her advice for young women breaking into the field? \xe2\x80\x9cIf you have a question or an idea, speak up! Find a mentor who can answer the questions you will surely have. Trust your judgement, but don\xe2\x80\x99t forget how important it is to listen as well.\xe2\x80\x9d #WeAreHPE #WomenInTech #STEM'

b'In 2017, we surpassed our goal to reduce #GreenhouseGas emissions by 25%, which is why we\xe2\x80\x99ve set a new one: 55% by 2025. Whether we\xe2\x80\x99re driving change on a global scale or contributing on local level, every little bit helps. Take our team in Bogota for instance, they planted 140 trees with their loved ones at La Calera Cundinamarca. :Colombia: #WeAreHPE #Sustainability #LivingProgress #ClimateChange'

b'Ever wonder what our Superdome Flex Servers looked like under the hood?
:hammer_and_wrench:
:hammer_and_wrench:
#Servers #Infrastructure #WeAreHPE'

b"\xe2\x80\x9cMy #SpiritAnimal would be a tiger. I have personal strength and courage, and I can act fast when needed.\xe2\x80\x9d Zara Hussain, an HPE Presales Specialist in Bracknell, has the eye of the tiger to embrace any situation \xe2\x80\x93 in the office or at home \xe2\x80\x93 with agility and prowess. :tiger_face: What's your spirit animal? #LifeInsideTheElement #HumanElement #WeAreHPE #LifeAtHPE"

b'Ahh\xe2\x80\xa6 there\xe2\x80\x99s no better feeling than having an organized server rack. Those neatly patched cables\xe2\x80\xa6 That color coordination\xe2\x80\xa6:smiling_face_with_heart-eyes: Think you\xe2\x80\x99ve got an impressive set up? Share them with us by tagging your posts with @HPE.'

b'A racecar can generate around 400 GB of data on a race weekend, helping make crucial decisions like when to pit. That\xe2\x80\x99s why @redbullracing\xe2\x80\x99s got us trackside so they can focus on what\xe2\x80\x99s important: getting on the podium. #PoweredbyHPE #F1'

b'HPE Brazil team member @monascabral believes that inclusion and diversity should be learned at work and at home. That\xe2\x80\x99s why she brought her family to the Brazil #Pride parade along with her colleagues. Slide to see photos from our other Pride events around the world.
:rainbow_flag_selector:
:rainbow_flag_selector:
As June comes to a close, thank you for honoring those who helped pave the way for the #LGBTQ+ community and sharing your Pride celebrations with us. 
#WeAreHPE #TogetherWeStand'
b'Can you believe it\xe2\x80\x99s been a week since our favorite #tech conference? We can\xe2\x80\x99t either. Here are some of our favorite moments from #HPEDiscover.'

b'Disney\xe2\x80\x99s StudioLAB is transforming modern #storytelling. Follow along with Alice Taylor to preview how HPE technology is helping her team revolutionize animation, enabling #creativity in new ways. #WomenInTech #HPEDiscover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cFor us, it was like opening a treasure box of possibilities.\xe2\x80\x9d @susie_wolff, Team Principal of @venturi_fe, shares at #HPEDiscover how working with HPE enabled her team to better innovate through speedy data processing. #PoweredbyHPE #FormulaE'

b'Hope you grabbed your walking shoes, because we\xe2\x80\x99re taking you on a tour of the Hewlett Packard Labs exhibit at #HPEDiscover. From design concepts to our new technology toolbox, our Labs team knows how to show up. Up next, Labs expert Rebecca Lewington gives an inside scoop on our latest innovations and the ethics of #AI with tech influencer Ronald van Loon. Rounding us off, HPE VP Paul Muller takes us #behindthescenes as he dives into our tech\xe2\x80\x99s inner workings with industry experts. Want more updates? Follow along on our Stories! #HPEAI'

b'The future of #agriculture is at the tip of our fingers. Partnering with Purdue University\xe2\x80\x99s world-renowned College of Agriculture, we\xe2\x80\x99re enabling a digital program that uses #IoT technology to gather, transmit, and analyze field data. The ultimate goal? To create more effective ways to sustainably grow nutritious food to fight world hunger. #HPEDiscover #WeAreHPE #PoweredByHPE #Sustainability #IoT #Networking #AgTech'

b'Inspired by @itgetsbetter, we hosted a panel to empower our employees to come to work as their true selves. They were joined by two HPE leaders, Chris Drago and Mike Coumos, who shared their experiences and HPE\xe2\x80\x99s support for our employees. #WeAreHPE #TogetherWeStand #pride'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWorld Health Day is about universal healthcare for all.\xc2\xa0One path to this is using #tech make healthcare faster, and less expensive.\xe2\x80\x9d For Rich Bird, the World Wide Industry Marketing Manager for Healthcare and Life Sciences at HPE, every day feels like #WorldHealthDay. From tinkering with his first Nintendo Gameboy as a kid to designing deploying and supporting networks and finally to marketing \xe2\x80\x93 Rich is proud his work in tech can \xe2\x80\x9cChange real peoples\xe2\x80\x99 lives, in a very real and tangible way.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'There\xe2\x80\x99s a lot of hype around AI, but what\xe2\x80\x99s the reality? Beena Ammanath, HPE VP of AI, #BigData & Innovation joined #PostLive to talk about some misconceptions of AI and best practices to accelerate adoption. As Beena explains it, #AI is in the beginning stages of development, specifically in artificial \xe2\x80\x9cnarrow intelligence,\xe2\x80\x9d which mimics very specific human capabilities like playing chess. Once applied to other industries, this tech drastically improves work\xe2\x80\x94whether it\xe2\x80\x99s with #healthcare professionals providing early disease diagnosis from medical image analysis or utility companies preventing service outages to everyday customers. #WeAreHPE'

b'If you snooze, you lose! Fabian Lenz, an Inside Sales Team Lead, says his motto is to never stop learning. \xe2\x80\x9cTechnology will always impact our daily lives in new ways, so we should never stop learning about it.\xe2\x80\x9d #WeAreHPE\xc2\xa0#LifeInsideTheElement #HumanElement'

b'See that black connector in the middle? That\xe2\x80\x99s where the #opticalfiber ribbon attaches to our ILX module, which can transfer over a terabit \xe2\x80\x93 a trillion bits \xe2\x80\x93 per second using microscopic lasers, making it a thousand times faster than a typical wired #Ethernet connection using much less energy. \xe2\x80\x9cWhat\xe2\x80\x99s neat about this, beyond sheer speed, is that all the components in that module used to be separate parts, which made this technology big, expensive and difficult to service. We\xe2\x80\x99re integrating them to make it small, cost-effective and user-friendly,\xe2\x80\x9d explains Rebecca Lewington from Hewlett Packard Labs. #WeAreHPE #HewlettPackardLabs #Sustainability'

b'#TBT \xe2\x80\x9cWe were told we were crazy when we started this.\xe2\x80\x9d Dr. Eng Lim Goh explained how critics were skeptical of HPE\xe2\x80\x99s Spaceborne computer project. Would an off-the-shelf server be able to withstand the harsh conditions of outer space, like radiation? We now know, of course, that the #Spaceborne computer has been running successfully onboard the #InternationalSpaceStation for more than a year. :rocket: :man_astronaut: :woman_astronaut: #supercomputer #EconSpace #WeAreHPE'
b'Happy Holidays! As we head into 2019, we hope you find #inspiration in ordinary places \xe2\x80\x93 even in your morning cup of #coffee. #WeAreHPE :camera:: @beers_vision'

b'In the next few decades, @WorldEconomicForum predicts we\xe2\x80\x99ll need 70% more food to feed the world\xe2\x80\x99s growing population. Already, many are chronically undernourished. How can tech help solve this food challenge? Last month, we launched Tech Impact 2030 at the WEF Sustainable Development Impact Summit 2018. This open collaboration with #WEF brings together technology, industry and government to power meaningful change by the year 2030. Our first challenge\xe2\x80\xa6 to help solve #worldhunger. At the event, @PurdueScience Dean Patrick Wolfe, @i_amthecode Founder and CEO Marianne Eve Jamme, #HPE CTO Mark Potter and Head of WEF\xe2\x80\x99s Centre for Global Public Goods Dominic Waughray discussed how precision #agriculture could grow yield, reduce waste and create a #sustainable food supply through #IoT technology.\n#WeAreHPE #WorldEconomicForum #TechImpact2030 #WFD2018 #ZeroHunger :camera_with_flash:: @benhiderimages'
